name: ssl-generator
description: Generates SSL certificates from a CA certificate & key

scripts.test: node --harmony ./node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover --hook-run-in-context ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --R spec --U exports test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Adam Snodgrass <overra@gmail.com>
